pr_title: [BEAM-10715] Update Jet Runner validates runner testing

timeline.message: Adapt Jet Runner to recent framework changes
Add pre-commit checks for Jet Runner

timeline.bodyText:
We should be dropping processing based timers if the watermark advances to infinity and not be executing them.
We can keep the existing behavior that we had but in a follow-up PR it would make sense to fix this logic.
timeline.author: lukecwik

timeline.message: Remove Jet Runner validation tests from pre-commit
